Hack Club

A nonprofit founded by Forbes 30 Under 30‚Äôs Zach Latta, Hack Club brings student-led coding clubs to high schools across the world. I worked with Hack Club to create a new homepage and design system that demonstrates how coding is for everyone.
Visit Site!
HackClub.com (archived)

Homepage Design

I created a homepage that answers the nonprofit‚Äôs age-old questions of ‚ÄúWhat is a hack club?‚Äù to students, teachers, and parents. It shows that coding can be fun and inspires students to start their own Hack Club.

Inclusive Icons

It is well know that the tech industry has a diversity problem, and Hack Club was founded on the belief that coding is for everyone. I created a simple avatar and icon system that represents the diversity of students everywhere.
